Class BankAccount

java.lang.Object
  BankAccount

public class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object

Describes Bank Accounts that have a name and a balance When you make a new BankAccount (specifying the name of the account holder) the balance is set to 0. deposit(double amount) will add an amount to the balance of the account. withdraw(double amount) will withdraw an amount from the balance of the account, as long as the current balance is big enough. statement() will print out a brief statement of the account (name and current balance)

          Construct a new BankAccount object.
